players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie has been acting suspiciously and I don't trust him."
Charlie: "I understand Alice's concern, but accusing me without evidence only sows confusion. Let's focus on gathering information before jumping to conclusions."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and can confirm his role."
Bob: "Vote for Charlie to arrest the mafia and protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob's accusation seems rushed and baseless. Why would a detective reveal their findings so openly and put themselves at risk this early? Something doesn't add up."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Charlie has been acting suspiciously and I don't trust him."
Charlie: "I understand Alice's concern, but accusing me without evidence only sows confusion. Let's focus on gathering information before jumping to conclusions."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and can confirm his role."
You: "Vote for Charlie to arrest the mafia and protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob's accusation seems rushed and baseless. Why would a detective reveal their findings so openly and put themselves at risk this early? Something doesn't add up."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
